name: Calm Down, Will
description:
Warning: This game contains flashing lights that may cause photosensitive epilepsy.



Calm Down, Will is a first-person story driven horror game.

You will explore two places that looks very familiar. As always, a family murder occurred in the looping hallway. In the hallway, walk through the boring story of the death of Ross. Also of course like other hospitals, Something terrible happend at Valentine Hospital which is closed for a long time, There are corpses all over the place and monsters roaming around. Discover the story of James Valentine, the missing director of Valentine Hospital. Until Will comes.

When you finish the chapter as Timmy to the end, you'll start to play as Will. Will has superhuman abilities for some reason and can uncover the real truth of the boring stories. When begin of the first chapter of Will, the game looks like returning to the first scene, But the game is actually not over, So keep playing as Will to the end to solve the hidden story of the hidden story.
